name: com.febucci.text-animator-unity
description: Bring your dialogues to life in a few and simple steps with Text Animator for Unity, working in UI Toolkit (Unity 6.3+) and TextMeshPro. Includes a powerful typewriter, many effects and much more.
displayName: Text Animator for Unity by Febucci

samples.description: The essentials to get started with Text Animator for Unity
An example of how to setup typewriter sounds
